transactionbodycustomfield.description:
Choose from one of the following to determine how landed cost is allocated for each item on this transaction:
Weight - allocated cost per item = (weight of each item/total weight of eligible items) * total landed cost Quantity - allocated cost per item = total landed cost / number of eligible items Value - allocated cost per item = value of each item / total value of eligible items Note: Eligible items are the items with the Track Landed Cost box marked on their record. Noneligible items are not allocated landed cost
transactionbodycustomfield.help:
Choose from one of the following to determine how landed cost is allocated for each item on this transaction:
Weight - allocated cost per item = (weight of each item/total weight of eligible items) * total landed cost Quantity - allocated cost per item = total landed cost / number of eligible items Value - allocated cost per item = value of each item / total value of eligible items Note: Eligible items are the items with the Track Landed Cost box marked on their record. Noneligible items are not allocated landed cost
transactionbodycustomfield.label: Nuage Landed Cost Method
